scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "WEB,API-PY,API-GO" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:py" "bun run dev:go"
scripts.dev:py: cd apps/api-py && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.serve:py: cd apps/api-py && cross-env ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000 JWT_COOKIE_SECURE=0 DISABLE_LOCAL_STT=1 JWT_SECRET_KEY=dev-secret-key-change-in-production uv run uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000
scripts.serve:go: cd apps/gateway && cross-env ORCHESTRATOR_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000 WS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000 JWT_SECRET_KEY=dev-secret-key-change-in-production PORT=8080 go run .
scripts.dev:e2e: concurrently --kill-others --names "WEB,API-PY,API-GO" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "bun run dev:web" "bun run serve:py" "bun run serve:go"
scripts.api-py:ruff: cd apps/api-py && uv run ruff check . && uv run ruff format --check .
scripts.api-py:ty: cd apps/api-py && uv run ty check .
